extension.caption: E-mail
extension.author: Lee Cher Yeong

extension.description: E-mail field type validates the e-mail entered by users before storing it to the database. The e-mail will be displayed with the 'mailto' protocol in the front-end. To protect against e-mail harvester, e-mail is cloaked through javascript.
